name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, Guangzhou Metro has begun to allow individuals to place subway advertisements. Some people spend 1,000 yuan to place resumes, while others place blind date and birthday wishes advertisements.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Domestic "anti-fraud" is gradually moving towards a "dynamic zero" trend. Many netizens on social media are telling their own experiences.
One netizen said that because he opened a phone card, his "anti-fraud code" turned yellow.
One netizen said that because he went on a business trip to Fujian, China Telecom stopped his phone card.
Another netizen said that now withdrawing more than 50,000 requires approval from leaders at all levels.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The cover of the new version of English textbooks, which will be used in Jiangsu in September 2024, has been completely replaced with Chinese style elements.
According to Yilin Publishing House, one of the main features of the new version of English textbooks is to adhere to the position of Chinese culture and cultivate patriotism.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in order to further strengthen the party discipline learning and education of retired cadres and party members, and continuously improve the ideological and political quality and job performance ability of retired party organization secretaries, training courses for retired cadres’ party branch secretaries have been held in many places.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 13, Haikou, Hainan. Lawyers from all over the country gathered at the Hainan High Court to support lawyer Zhang Qingfang, and to fight for the lawyer's right to defense and to ask for an explanation from the leaders of the Haikou High Court.
On May 24, lawyer Zhang Qingfang was forcibly taken away by several bailiffs while defending his right to defense in the court of the Haikou Intermediate Court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 13, according to Xinyang News Network, due to the continuous drought and lack of rain in Henan, the Provincial Finance Department issued 30 million yuan in drought relief funds. Many people in Henan said in the comment area that they had never heard of it and had not received a penny.
Some netizens said that they did not want state subsidies, as long as there were wells and electricity in the fields and water in the rivers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 13, Hunan. A senior student reported Chen Zhiming, secretary of the Party branch of the Hunan University of International Business and Economics’ School of Music, for sexual harassment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 13, a cadre from Yanping Village, Reshi Town, Changde City, Hunan Province, put his feet on the table while receiving people who came to do business, smoking and playing games, and ignored the people. The work card on the table showed that the cadre was Zhang Yichun, the branch secretary.
The local government said: He will be criticized and educated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Urban management may become history
According to the Beihai Municipal People's Government of Guangxi, on June 10, Beihai City announced the abolition of the Comprehensive Administrative Law Enforcement Bureau, and the powers were transferred to various competent departments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 14, Jinzhou, Liaoning.
The School of Information Science and Technology of Bohai University suddenly required all senior students to go for internships, which caused dissatisfaction among students. As a result, students surrounded the office that day to ask for an explanation.
It is reported that the school previously said that students who were taking the postgraduate entrance examination or the civil service examination could choose to stay in school to study and go for internships in the second semester of their senior year after the exams. However, the newly appointed dean of the school required the entire school to go to enterprises for internships.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 13, Xinyang, Henan. Gushi Experimental High School was 37 degrees Celsius and the air conditioner was not turned on, causing students to shout in the middle of the night

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/DLdsfWPgo9

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 13, Weiwei shares issued an announcement stating that the Development Zone Branch of Zhijiang Taxation Bureau of the State Administration of Taxation determined that the tax payable by its subsidiary Zhijiang Liquor Industry from January 1, 1994 to October 31, 2009 totaled 85.0029 million yuan. 
In the morning trading today, Weiwei shares fluctuated downward, and as of the midday close, it fell 1.58%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Malicious selling of misery
On June 13, expert Niu Wenxin said in a program that there are a group of people who maliciously sell misery for the stock market, desperately expressing how much money they have lost, and this practice is actually a malicious short selling. The stock market must be wary of the motives behind these people.
This statement triggered a unanimous complaint from stockholders: Can't you stand stockholders complaining about losing money?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, many banks in Shenzhen required appointments for large withdrawals of more than 50,000 yuan. The reporter visited some bank branches in Shenzhen and found that withdrawals below 20,000 yuan can be made through ATMs; withdrawals between 20,000 and 50,000 yuan can be made directly at the counter; but withdrawals of more than 50,000 yuan require advance appointments with the branch, and larger withdrawals require proof of actual use.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of June 12, a nurse at the First Affiliated Hospital of Hainan Medical College was suddenly attacked by a patient who tried to slit her throat. The hospital said the patient was not mentally abnormal and there was no medical dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 14, on the streets of Auckland, New Zealand, when Chinese Premier Li Qiang's motorcade passed by, a fierce conflict broke out between the team welcoming Li Qiang and the team protesting against Li Qiang's visit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, due to continuous rainfall, floods broke out in many places in Jilin and Heilongjiang.
On June 13, after heavy rain, Harbin was severely flooded. Residents had to wade through the water and cars parked on the roadside were washed away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/ae6x3NvGQr

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, the Combat Readiness Construction Bureau of the Shanghai Garrison of the People's Liberation Army sent a letter to Shanghai state-owned enterprises, requesting the compilation of data and information on militia construction in Shanghai state-owned enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 12, the BBC reported that Taiwanese LGBT photographer Lin Jiahang was detained while attending a book fair in Nanjing on May 31. Lin Jiahang said that he was taken away by the police when he was setting up a stall to promote his photography book that afternoon. The police not only checked his suitcase, but also took him to a nearby public security bureau, stripped him naked, took photos, drew blood, and checked his Alipay transaction records. He was then asked to read a text recording of a fraud group and was detained with other people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, the College of Information and Intelligent Science and Technology of Hunan Agricultural University held a class meeting on the theme of "Special Action for Climbing the Wall". The publicity materials showed that "the school will cooperate with the Internet Information Office, the National Security Bureau and other departments to catch a number of typical cases of people who still illegally climb over the wall after this publicity."
